018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.JsonState;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.ActorSystemAware;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
026import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
027
028import org.json.JSONObject;
029import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
030
031import java.io.InputStream;
032import java.nio.file.Files;
033import java.nio.file.Path;
034import java.nio.file.Paths;
035import java.sql.Connection;
036import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
037import java.sql.ResultSet;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.logging.Level;
040import java.util.logging.Logger;
041
042/**
043 * POJO actor for building and outputting workflow reports.
044 *
045 * <p>This actor provides a section-based report building mechanism.
046 * Sections can be added via actions and the final report is output
047 * to the outputMultiplexer.</p>
048 *
049 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
050 * <ul>
051 *   <li>{@code addWorkflowInfo} - Add workflow metadata section</li>
052 *   <li>{@code addJsonStateSection} - Add actor's JsonState as YAML</li>
053 *   <li>{@code addTransitionSection} - Add transition summary from logs</li>
054 *   <li>{@code report} - Build and output the report</li>
055 * </ul>
056 *
057 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
058 * @since 2.15.0
059 */
060public class ReportBuilderActor implements CallableByActionName, ActorSystemAware {
061
062    private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReportBuilderActor.class.getName();
063    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
064
065    private IIActorSystem system;
066    private Connection connection;
067    private final ReportBuilder builder = new ReportBuilder();
068
069    @Override
070    public void setActorSystem(IIActorSystem system) {
071        logger.entering(CLASS_NAME, "setActorSystem", system);
072        this.system = system;
073
074        // Auto-initialize database connection from DistributedLogStore singleton
075        if (this.connection == null) {
076            DistributedLogStore logStore = DistributedLogStore.getInstance();
077            if (logStore != null) {
078                this.connection = logStore.getConnection();
079                logger.info("ReportBuilderActor: Auto-initialized database connection");
080            }
081        }
082
083        logger.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "setActorSystem");
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Sets the database connection (for testing).
088     */
089    public void setConnection(Connection connection) {
090        this.connection = connection;
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
095        logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.callByActionName: actionName=" + actionName);
096        try {
097            ActionResult result = switch (actionName) {
098                case "addWorkflowInfo" -> addWorkflowInfo();
099                case "addJsonStateSection" -> addJsonStateSection(args);
100                case "addTransitionSection" -> addTransitionSection();
101                case "report" -> report();
102                default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
103            };
104            logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.callByActionName: result=" + result.isSuccess());
105            return result;
106        } catch (Exception e) {
107            logger.logp(Level.WARNING, CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", "Exception", e);
108            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
109        }
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * Adds workflow info section.
114     *
115     * <p>Gets workflow path from nodeGroup, reads the YAML file to extract
116     * name and description, and adds a WorkflowInfoSection.</p>
117     */
118    private ActionResult addWorkflowInfo() {
119        logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.addWorkflowInfo");
120
121        String workflowPath = getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup();
122        if (workflowPath == null) {
123            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get workflow path from nodeGroup");
124        }
125
126        String name = null;
127        String description = null;
128
129        // Try to read workflow YAML for name and description
130        try {
131            Path path = Paths.get(workflowPath);
132            if (!Files.exists(path)) {
133                path = Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir"), workflowPath);
134            }
135
136            if (Files.exists(path)) {
137                try (InputStream is = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
138                    Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
139                    Map<String, Object> data = yaml.load(is);
140                    if (data != null) {
141                        name = (String) data.get("name");
142                        Object descObj = data.get("description");
143                        description = descObj != null ? descObj.toString().trim() : null;
144                    }
145                }
146            }
147        } catch (Exception e) {
148            logger.warning("ReportBuilderActor.addWorkflowInfo: Could not read workflow file: " + e.getMessage());
149        }
150
151        builder.addSection(new WorkflowInfoSection(workflowPath, name, description));
152        return new ActionResult(true, "Workflow info section added");
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * Adds JsonState section for specified actor.
157     *
158     * <p>Arguments (JSON):</p>
159     * <ul>
160     *   <li>{@code actor} - Actor name (required)</li>
161     *   <li>{@code path} - JsonState path filter (optional)</li>
162     * </ul>
163     */
164    private ActionResult addJsonStateSection(String args) {
165        logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.addJsonStateSection: args=" + args);
166
167        String actorName;
168        String path = "";
169
170        try {
171            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
172            actorName = json.getString("actor");
173            path = json.optString("path", "");
174        } catch (Exception e) {
175            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage());
176        }
177
178        IIActorRef<?> targetActor = system.getIIActor(actorName);
179        if (targetActor == null) {
180            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor not found: " + actorName);
181        }
182
183        JsonState jsonState = targetActor.json();
184        if (jsonState == null) {
185            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor has no JsonState: " + actorName);
186        }
187
188        String yamlContent = jsonState.toStringOfYaml(path);
189        builder.addSection(new JsonStateSection(actorName, yamlContent));
190
191        return new ActionResult(true, "JsonState section added for " + actorName);
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * Adds transition section from log database.
196     */
197    private ActionResult addTransitionSection() {
198        logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.addTransitionSection");
199
200        if (connection == null) {
201            return new ActionResult(false, "Database connection not available");
202        }
203
204        long sessionId;
205        try {
206            sessionId = getSessionIdFromNodeGroup();
207        } catch (Exception e) {
208            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get session ID: " + e.getMessage());
209        }
210
211        TransitionSection section = new TransitionSection();
212
213        try {
214            String sql = "SELECT label, level, message FROM logs " +
215                         "WHERE session_id = ? AND message LIKE 'Transition %' " +
216                         "ORDER BY timestamp";
217
218            try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
219                ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
220                try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
221                    while (rs.next()) {
222                        String label = rs.getString("label");
223                        String message = rs.getString("message");
224
225                        boolean success = message.contains("SUCCESS");
226                        String errorMessage = null;
227
228                        if (!success) {
229                            int dashIdx = message.indexOf(" - ");
230                            if (dashIdx > 0) {
231                                errorMessage = message.substring(dashIdx + 3);
232                            }
233                        }
234
235                        section.addTransition(
236                            label != null ? label : "unknown",
237                            success,
238                            errorMessage
239                        );
240                    }
241                }
242            }
243        } catch (Exception e) {
244            logger.warning("ReportBuilderActor.addTransitionSection: DB error: " + e.getMessage());
245            return new ActionResult(false, "Database error: " + e.getMessage());
246        }
247
248        builder.addSection(section);
249        return new ActionResult(true, "Transition section added");
250    }
251
252    /**
253     * Builds and outputs the report.
254     */
255    private ActionResult report() {
256        logger.info("ReportBuilderActor.report");
257
258        String reportContent = builder.build();
259        reportToMultiplexer(reportContent);
260
261        return new ActionResult(true, reportContent);
262    }
263
264    /**
265     * Gets workflow path from nodeGroup actor.
266     */
267    private String getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup() {
268        if (system == null) return null;
269
270        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
271        if (nodeGroup == null) return null;
272
273        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getWorkflowPath", "");
274        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
275    }
276
277    /**
278     * Gets session ID from nodeGroup actor.
279     */
280    private long getSessionIdFromNodeGroup() {
281        if (system == null) {
282            throw new RuntimeException("ActorSystem not set");
283        }
284
285        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
286        if (nodeGroup == null) {
287            throw new RuntimeException("nodeGroup not found");
288        }
289
290        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getSessionId", "");
291        if (!result.isSuccess()) {
292            throw new RuntimeException("Could not get session ID from nodeGroup");
293        }
294
295        return Long.parseLong(result.getResult());
296    }
297
298    /**
299     * Outputs report to outputMultiplexer.
300     */
301    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
302        if (system == null) return;
303
304        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = system.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
305        if (multiplexer == null) return;
306
307        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
308        arg.put("source", "report-builder");
309        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
310        arg.put("data", data);
311        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
312    }
313}
